content: I can see from the manual there are some built in theories like Main, Complex_Main, Pure, HOL, FOL, ZF, etc. How can I see a complete list of all the background theories? For example, I didn't see IFOL in the manual but it appears to be such a theory. And for each theory, is there an easy way to access the .thy file? I can see a "What's in Main" document but I don't know how to open the actual theory file itself.
Isabelle documentation page contains a section "Theory libraries for Isabelle2022" that has links to HTML presentations of theories. IFOL is under FOL there.
